game.name: Happy Door
game.categories: Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Steam Workshop, Steam Workshop, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Subtitle Options, Surround Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 최대 4명까지 플레이할 수 있는 마법사 온라인 협동 공포 게임입니다. 크리처가 스폰되기 전에 빛으로 그들을 막고 안전하게 물건들을 회수해오세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Magic, Horror, Co-op Survive together in Happy Door, a mysterious space with fellow wizards. Gather resources through co-op play and purchase powerful spells to endure the horror.
